{!Contact.Name},
Welcome to your iContact for Salesforce CRM Account!
Thanks for signing up for iContact for Salesforce CRM. Now you can utilize powerful email marketing all from the comfort of Salesforce CRM. Here are just a few features you will find available at your fingertips:
* Allows you to reuse your own brand-compliant emails, all within Salesforce * Supports 98-99% deliverability on all your messages * Ability to segment campaign members based on email-actions such as message-opens, clicks, email-forwarding and much more * Gives you access to email marketing statistics related to your campaign, messages, and contacts * Includes pre-configured reports and gauges for your campaigns and messages
Need additional help navigating iContact for Salesforce? Visit our help guide for more information or contact your Account Manager.
Sincerely,
iContact for Salesforce CRM Account Managers
Email Newsletters, Autoresponders, Surveys, & RSS Feeds!
